entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 11 February 2023
